casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. TRI EAGLE FUELS, L.L.C.
v.
DAWSON. 2018-0556 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 24, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Sua sponte, appellants shall show cause within 10 days why this case should not be dismissed for lack of a final appealable order. Appellees may file a response within 7 days of the filing of appellant's response to the show-cause order.
